page_title: My Best Agent - No More Limits
hero_subtitle: The things you thought were impossible? You're about to do them. Create, automate, execute — your AI agent turns your ideas into reality. No code. No expertise. Just you and infinite possibilities.
demo_msg_1: I want to launch my own business but I don't know how to code
demo_msg_2: You don't need to. Tell me your idea and I'll build it. Website, emails, automation — I handle all of it.
demo_msg_3: I never thought I could do this
demo_msg_4: That's exactly why I exist. Let's start. What do you want to create?
chat_placeholder: What do you want to create?
usecases_title: Things you never thought you could do
usecases_subtitle: Until now, these required skills, time, or money you didn't have. Not anymore.
usecase_email_desc: Your agent reads, sorts, responds, and follows up. Like having a personal assistant — without the salary.
usecase_website_desc: No coding bootcamp needed. Describe what you want, and watch it come to life. Landing pages, stores, portfolios — done.
usecase_data_desc: Spreadsheets, reports, analytics — your agent turns chaos into clarity. Insights you'd never find alone.
usecase_social_desc: Content creation, scheduling, engagement. Your social presence runs itself while you focus on what matters.
usecase_messaging_desc: Automatic updates, reminders, follow-ups. Your agent keeps everyone aligned without you chasing people.
usecase_research_desc: Hours of research compressed into minutes. Your agent finds, reads, and summarizes — you get the knowledge.
section_how_subtitle: Simpler than you think. More powerful than you imagine.
step_1_desc: Not a form. A conversation. Your agent learns about you, your goals, your way of working.
step_2_desc: Email, messaging, calendar — whatever you use. Your agent meets you where you already are.
step_3_desc: "Build me a website." "Handle my inbox." "Remind me to follow up." Just say it.
step_4_desc: Things that took you hours now take seconds. Things you couldn't do? Now you can.
feature_fullstack_desc: You think it. You say it. It exists. Websites, automations, content — created in minutes, not months.
feature_context_desc: No explaining yourself over and over. Your agent remembers everything and anticipates what comes next.
feature_execute_title: It works, so you don't have to
feature_execute_desc: Not suggestions. Actions. Your agent doesn't tell you what to do — it does it for you.
feature_everywhere_desc: Phone, computer, any app. Your agent follows you and never misses a beat.
feature_secure_desc: Everything encrypted. Nothing sold. Your data is yours — always.
feature_improve_desc: Every week, new capabilities. What's impossible today becomes possible tomorrow.
section_pricing_subtitle: Start free. Upgrade when you need more power.
pricing_fair_use: * Fair use policy — no hard limits, smart throttling for heavy usage
cta_title: A month from now, you'll wonder how you lived without this
cta_subtitle: The people who said "I could never do that" are now doing it. Your turn.
footer_tagline: The AI that turns "I can't" into "I just did."
footer_copyright: © 2026 My Best Agent. All rights reserved.
chat_upgrade_message: Upgrade to Pro for unlimited messages and all AI models
